install.name: S5 Media Player
install.author: Shape5.com
install.description: This module will play FLV and MP4 media files. Up to 30 files can be added at one time in the player.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: height
param.label: Height
param.description: Enter the height in pixels of tthe media player.

param.name: width
param.label: Width
param.description: Enter the width of the media player

param.name: lightdark
param.label: Media Player Theme
param.description: Choose between dark and light theme to match the style of site you are running

param.default: You may enter up to 30 Videos. If you do not wish to use 30 videos leave the extra fields blank.
param.label: Note:

param.name: s5mp_movie1
param.label: Video 1 URL
param.description: Enter the URL for your SWF or MP4 file here

param.name: s5mp_icon1
param.label: Video 1 Icon
param.description: Enter the URL for the JPG, GIF, PNG, etc that you would like for a thumbnail

param.description: Enter the URL for your SWF or MP4 file here
